features: Deep Moisturisation: Infused with Tea Tree and Peppermint, this hand pack provides intensive moisture, perfect for dry and chapped hands.
Nourishing Ingredients: Shea Butter, Urea, and Glycerin help lock in moisture and soften the skin.
20-Minute Treatment: Relax and enjoy a 20-minute at-home hand spa to restore hydration and improve skin texture.
Cooling & Refreshing: Peppermint extract provides a refreshing and cooling sensation while soothing tired hands
Perfect for All Skin Types: Gentle enough for daily use, yet effective for even the driest hands
description: Product description Revitalize your hands with the Tea Tree & Peppermint Deep Moisturising Hand Pack. Specially formulated with natural Tea Tree and Peppermint extracts, this intensive hand treatment deeply penetrates and nourishes dry, chapped hands, leaving them feeling soft, hydrated, and refreshed. Perfect for a 20-minute home spa treatment, this hand pack helps restore moisture and provides a soothing experience. Ideal for those with dry or rough hands in need of extra care. Ingredients Aqua, Urea, Paraffinum Liquidum, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Petrolatum, Glycerin, Propylene Glycol, Glyceryl Stearate, PEG-40 Sorbitan Stearate, Potassium Cetyl Phosphate, Cetearyl Alcohol, Steareth-21, Steareth-2, Dimethicone, Sodium Acrylates/Sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer, Isohexadecane, Polysorbate 80, Sorbitan Oleate, Tocopheryl Acetate, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Carbomer, Triethanolamine, Butylene Glycol, Melaleuca Alternifolia (Tea Tree) Leaf/Stem Extract, Xanthan Gum, Pentylene Glycol, Mentha Piperita (Peppermint) Extract, Parfum, Phenoxyethanol, Chlorphenesin, Limonene. Directions Thoroughly wash and dry hands. Take out and unfold the gloves. Wear the gloves on your hands. Remove after 20 minutes, and enjoy deeply moisturised hands. Safety Warning For external use only: Avoid contact with eyes. If contact occurs, rinse immediately with water. Avoid using on broken or irritated skin. Keep out of reach of children. See more
